Text:
Many thanks for all your hard work.

On a side note, I always thought that since Kang came from a future timeline, he would be more mellow to backfires and setbacks, not mouthing off like he did in one of the earlier issues of this pack!

u'r most welcome dragomaster99; thank YOU for the excellent suggestions. 

I've noticed that most comic authors will usually depict the villain (from any timeline) as not just a little bit insane.  methinks its their insatiable appetite to rule the world/universe/microverse that warps their judgment.
